versos: (jebusite) 2 Samuel 5:6 - "The king and his men marched to Jerusalem to attack the Jebusites, who lived there.";;;
(chaff) Psalm 1:4 - "Not so the wicked They are like chaff that the wind blows away.";;;
(wheat) Matthew 13:24 - Another parable put he forth unto them
(glass) 1 Corinthians 13:12 - "For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.";;;
(value) Proverbs 31:10 - "A wife of noble character who can find She is worth far more than rubies.";;;
(grieved) Ephesians 4:30 - "And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God, by whom you were sealed for the day of redemption.";;;
(wealth) Matthew 6:19 - "Do not store up for yourselves treasures on earth, where moths and vermin destroy, and where thieves break in and steal.";;;
(emperor) Romans 13:1 - "Let every person be subject to the governing authorities. For there is no authority except from God, and those that exist have been instituted by God.";;;
(working) Colossians 3:23 - "Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for human masters.";;;
(examined) 1 Corinthians 11:28 - "Everyone ought to examine themselves before they eat of the bread and drink from the cup.";;;
(cometh) Matthew 25:13 - "Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.";;;
(already) Romans 8:30 - And those he predestined, he also called; those he called, he also justified; those he justified, he also glorified.;;;
(shine) Genesis 1:16 - "God made two great lightsthe greater light to govern the day and the lesser light to govern the night. He also made the stars.";;;
(command) 1 John 4:21 - "And he has given us this command: Anyone who loves God must also love their brother and sister.";;;
(honour) "honour thy father and thy mother: that thy days may be long upon the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee." - Exodus 20:12;;;

(wherein) Genesis 28:13: "And, behold, the Lord stood above it, and said, I am the Lord God of Abraham thy father, and the God of Isaac: the land whereon thou liest, to thee will I give it, and to thy seed;";;;
(service) Romans 12:11 - "Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.";;;
(coming) Revelation 22:7 - "Behold, I am coming soon Blessed is he who keeps the words of the prophecy in this book.";;;
